messages.content:
Cite a relevant quote that reflects the message of the message.

Input:
Message: Never give up on your goals.

Given a list of elements, find how many possible combinations of the elements can be made.

Input:
H, O, C, N
Design an advertisement for a home security product.

Edit the text to make the meaning more precise.

Input:
The President announced an ambitious plan to cut taxes for all Americans.

Given a block of text, come up with a catchy headline that best represents the text.

Input:
The new coaching program will help you become a better leader and achieve higher professional success.
Give an example of a web service that could be automated using artificial intelligence.
What are the advantages of using a Scrum Agile methodology?
Answer this question: "What are the advantages of using AI in healthcare?"

Generate two similar sounding but semantically different words to contrast this word.

Input:
Light
